title.rendered: Safari 4×4 Snorkel SS79HPV Toyota Landcruiser 70 Series (2007-2020) 76 78 79 Series 4.5L

content.rendered:
The Safari 4×4 Snorkel SS79HPV Toyota Landcruiser 70 Series (2007-2020) 79 78 76 Series 4.5 V8 is uniquely designed to deliver 50% more airflow compared to the standard. With this increased air intake, it gives the necessary air volume that your engine demands. Also, it only supplies the coolest and cleanest air possible.

  • Designed and constructed in Australia, manufactured from quality UV stabilised  polyethylene
  • Designed to maximise airflow, ensuring supply ofcool air for maximum engine performance
  • Safari’s rounded style Air Ram; however with minimum 4” neck and an optimised air flow, low restriction grill
  • Fitting guide, with accurate cutting template designed to ensure successful fit-up
  • Positive sealed for water and dust protection
  • OEM+ durability and appearance

excerpt.rendered: Safari 4×4 Snorkel SS79HPV Toyota Landcruiser 70 SERIES (2007-2020) 76 78 79 Series 4.5L
